metadata.title: CVE-2018-7191 on Ubuntu 24.10 (oracular) - medium
metadata.description:
In the tun subsystem in the Linux kernel before 4.13.14, dev_get_valid_nameis not called before register_netdevice. This allows local users to cause adenial of service (NULL pointer dereference and panic) via anioctl(TUNSETIFF) call with a dev name containing a / character. This issimilar to CVE-2013-4343.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2018-7191` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

linux-image-6.8.0-31-generic - 6.8.0-31.31
linux-image-unsigned-6.8.0-31-generic - 6.8.0-31.31
linux-image-unsigned-6.8.0-31-generic-64k - 6.8.0-31.31
No subscription required

linux-image-unsigned-6.8.0-1008-aws - 6.8.0-1008.8
No subscription required

linux-image-unsigned-6.8.0-1007-azure - 6.8.0-1007.7
No subscription required

No subscription required
